message.entry: Failed to get the parameter tree from the ROS node.
Unable to get the list of parameters from the parameter tree.
Expected the input cell array to contain double, int32, char or logical data types.
Unable to find parameter {0}. To add a new parameter, see the "set" function.
Unable to set the value of the {0} parameter.
Unable to get the value of the {0} parameter. Only the following data types are supported as a scalar or cell array: double, int32, char, logical, and struct.
Expected the second input argument to be a cell array that contains numeric scalars or character vectors.
Unable to retrieve the dictionary for namespace {0}. Verify that the namespace exists.

Parameter {0} contains invalid characters. Numeric values of characters for string parameters must be in the range [0x9, 0xA, 0xD] | [0x20 - 0xD7FF] | [0xE000 - 0xFFFD]. Element {1} of the parameter value is out of range.
